title: Haitian Tree of Life Wall Sculpture
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide (3-7 Days)

 

Handmade Haitian Tree of Life Wall Sculpture

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

 

Color: Dark black steel, browns and pewter tones. It changes depending on the lighting.

Features:

  • In its many renditions, the Tree of Life is a tremendously popular and iconic image. It has a timeless elegance, fits into many decorative schemes, and is naturally appealing. It’s easy to love.
  • The tree reflects natural lighting, color variation varies from medium to dark silver.
  • Handmade from Recycled Steel Drum Oil Barrels (NO MACHINES USED).
  • We offer a hand up, not a hand out to our artist partners in Haiti. Each sale of their metal sculptures represents a positive step toward a better life.
  • Home Decor Farmhouse, Affordable Mother's Day Gift

Binding: Kitchen

Details: The “ Celtic Tree of Life” is a particularly poignant symbol in Haiti. Trees are a precious, though rapidly disappearing resource, where less than 1.5% of natural growth remains, due to deforestation. The culprits: poor land management practices and grinding poverty. Between land being cleared for subsistence farming - which constitutes two-thirds of Haitian labor activity - and wood being harvested to provide 70% of the nation’s fuel, the tropical forests of Haiti are virtually gone. The upshot is topsoil erosion amounting to 36 million tons annually, accelerated land degradation, silting lakes and waterways, increased greenhouse gases, and deaths numbering in the thousands due to mudslides when heavy weather strikes.

Package Dimensions: 18.5 x 18.0 x 1.0 inches

Hand-blown Pacific Wave Tabletop Sculpture

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Color: Multicolor

Features:

  • Crafted of hand-blown Favrile art glass
  • Depicts a powerful wave in vibrant blue with white “foam” curled and poised to break on the shore
  • Sits atop a square pedestal of solid clear Favrile art glass for contrast and stability
  • The Favrile process embeds the color within the glass
  • Our artisan’s meticulous attention to detail gives the sculpture its dynamic sense of movement that will make it the instant focal point in any room.

 

 

 

Binding: Kitchen

Details: Surf’s up when you choose our Pacific Wave Sculpture for your home or office. Crafted of hand-blown Favrile art glass, the tall figurine depicts a powerful wave in vibrant blue with white “foam” curled and poised to break on the shore. Pacific Wave sits atop a square pedestal of solid clear Favrile art glass for contrast and stability.

The Favrile process embeds the color within the glass. This allows for subtle variations in color and tone, which means that no 2 pieces are exactly alike and ensures yours is a one of a kind work of art. Our artisan’s meticulous attention to detail gives the sculpture its dynamic sense of movement that will make it the instant focal point in any room in which it is displayed.

Ideal in just about any décor style, our Pacific Wave Sculpture also makes an excellent gift for surfing enthusiasts, beach lovers or anyone who appreciates life’s natural beauty.

title: Handmade Round Luxury Rose Box
body_html:
Domestic Free Shipping USA [8-10 Days]


Handmade Round Luxury Rose Box

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance on every purchase!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Color:

Red

 

 

 

Features:

  • 100% Real Rose: Rosy Bunch roses are hand-picked at peak freshness and carefully arranged in a round black box by our master florists.
  • Preserved Roses: Each rose undergoes a cutting-edge method which allows them maintain their beauty and color for at least a year. With our eternal roses, we offer an elegant, luxurious way to create lasting moments with the people you cherish most. Not just once, but every day, all year.
  • “I Love You” Rose: Roses have long symbolized love, romance, passion, and friendship. They make the perfect for Valentine's Day, Anniversaries, Birthdays, Mother's day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and Wedding etc.
  • Perfectly Bloomed Roses: Each box contains 18 roses which make the whole rose box fuller and extremely more eye catching. The diameter of rose is 4-5cm/ 1.8- 2inch.
  • Zero Maintenance Care: All flowers need plenty of care. Not our Roses! These stunning real roses need no water or maintenance at all.

 

 

 

 

Details:

Make a timeless and classic impression with our immortal roses in a box.; Roses have long symbolized love, romance, passion, and friendship. They are the perfect way to say “I love you,” “Happy anniversary,” “I’m sorry,” or simply, “Thinking of you.” Nothing can be more delightful or charming than receiving a beautiful bouquet of roses, popping with bright colors and smelling like it was picked that morning.; Alas, fresh flowers don’t last for long. Even the lushest, freshest roses will begin to wilt within days. While your sentiment may stay forever, your flowers won’t.

We believe love is never fleeting, so your gifts shouldn’t be either. With our never withered roses, we offer an elegant, luxurious way to create lasting moments with the people you cherish most. Not just once, but every day, all year.; Our preserved roses are real roses that have been specially treated so they will last a year or longer. They are hand-picked at peak freshness and carefully arranged in a round black box by our master florists. Our round black boxes include 18 preserved roses.

We’ve specifically designed our boxes so that the bouquet can be seen beautifully, making them gift-able right away without requiring additional decoration. Your sweetie will be delighted to receive this gesture of love — the perfect embodiment of luxury, thoughtfulness, and romance, all contained in a gorgeous box that will last so much longer than flowers in a vase.;

Measurements: Box: D 7.8inch x H 8.4inch.

Roses: vary from 1.6-2 inch

Care Instruction: 1. Do NOT water your rose or allow it to wet. 2. Do NOT expose it to direct sunlight and strong light. 3. Do NOT remove roses from their box. 4. Store and display at room temperature and humidity. 5. Dust off by lightly blowing cold air with a hairdryer.

 

 

 

 

Package Dimensions:

8.5 x 7.3 x 7.3 inches

Key Features:
  • 5-in-1 Juice Extractor: The juice extractor will be a great helper for enjoying fresh fruit juices. This machine serves the functions of juicing, meat mincing, grinding, mixing, etc.
  • Nutrition Reserve: The 75mm wide feeder chute is ideal for many fruits to be chopped or sliced, which can extract the whole fruits. No clogging, no uneven mixing, no oxidation and preserve more nutrition.
  • 2-Speed Adjustable: Low speed mode is suitable for watermelon, oranges and other soft fruits and vegetables. Fast speed mode is perfect for apples, carrots and other hard fruits and vegetables.
  • Safety Protections: It designed with not only one protection device. The juicer is unable to start automatically unless the appliance and all parts have been correctly assembled. The overload protection system will shut off the juicer if machine is overloaded.
  • Easy to Clean: The juicer is easy to use, assemble, disassemble and clean. The food pusher, juicer cover, stainless steel strainer, slag pot and juice jug are all removable, dishwasher safe. And the non-removable parts can be easily cleaned with the cleaning brush which is included.
Description:

This is high quality 5 in 1 multi-functional juice extractor which combines juicer, blender, grinder, chopper and food processor all in one.

 

It can easily and quickly handle a wide variety of kitchen tasks. As a juicer, it can easily squeeze fresh fruit and vegetable juices. It has a wide mouth, allowing you to put an entire apple or pear in. As a blender, it is perfect for making creamy, frozen drinks and smoothies for the entire family. Also, you can use it for egg mixing. Besides, it can also be switched into a meat grinder, slicer or chopper as you like. And it is easy to operate and clean.

 

If you are looking for a product such as this, don't hesitate to bring one home now!

title: High Speed TF CARD MICRO CARD
body_html:
TF(micro-SD) CARD: 8G, 16G, 32G.
Regarding capacity and speed: there is a difference between the capacity of the factory product and the limited time capacity of the computer, which is caused by the different calculation standards;

Vendor capacity calculation method: 1GB=1000MB=1000000KB=1000000000 bytes; computer operating system capacity 1GB=1024MB=1048576KB=1073741824 bytes; the transmission speed is the manufacturer’s test result, for reference only, the actual read/write speed will vary depending on usage The device or file size is different.
Actual capacity:

The actual capacity of the product is about 90% of the nominal capacity, please refer to the actual capacity: 16G approximately: 14.5G, 32G approximately: 29.0G

title: HIGOLD -  Onda 4 Pieces Patio Conversation Set with Leather Surface
body_html:
Specification

Brand:HIGOLD

Details

Onda - Designed by Pininfarina

Being conceived for the outdoor, the Pininfarina design team took the inspiration from the dynamism, elegance and purity of the ocean waves, the empty space that is created when a wave is broken, resulting in to a hollow or tube wave (Onda in Italian). The heart of the collection is the structure, an aluminum band sustaining the cushions and becoming the iconic element of the whole Collection. Characterized by fluid lines - as the ones of the wave - the band beyond being an aesthetic element becomes also a functional element, a rigid armrest that can be used to lean objects. The choice of the materials come from the Pininfarina 360° design experience: the aluminum – coming from the car sector - for the structure , the fabrics – used in the yachts for its resistance – for the cushions. The collection is composed by a modular sofa, and a coffee table which offers multiple options to consumers.“We have looked at the magic of nature to give life to Onda which is distinctive and, at the same time, able to be integrated in different environments. Technology and know-how coming from different sectors make it really unique” affirms Paolo Pininfarina, Pininfarina Chairman.

 

Product - Onda Conversation Set with loveseat(Leather)

Materials

Frame - Space Shuttle Level Aluminum

Color - Beige/Gray/Black

Soft Roll - Leather

Wood - Myanmar Teak Wood

 

Craft

Metal Surface with Tiger Powder Coating

6MM Thicken Integrated Molding Aluminum

 

Dimension

Double Sofa - 36.6"D * 70.9"W * 30.3"H

Coffee Table - 47.2"D * 28.3"W * 17.1"H

Aluminum Thickness - 6MM

Teak Thickness - 10MM

Product Package

2 * Single Sofa

1 * Double Sofa

1 * Coffee Table

 

Resistance

UV resistant, Weather resistant, Rusty resistant, Anti-mildew

 

Maintenance Video for different part of your furniture

Cushion - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LS-H5xtVa1I&t=2s

Metal Frame - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MhYp_GT6HsU&t=1s

Textile - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bb7NQrMTWFU

Teak wood - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-yhNxEtS3vk&t=4s

 

 

Feature

1. The unique design of Onda allows numerous configuration set-ups, altogether offering over thirty customized options according to consumer’s tastes.

2. Top quality and environmental-friendly coating finish, teakwood and fabrics withhold the ability to withstand all kinds of outdoor conditions.

3. Inspired by car sector structure, emphasis and exposure of the internal heavy duty aluminum structure provides a sense of security to the user, it also creates a distinctive visual aesthetic.

4. The collection offers a full suite to satisfy every outdoor relaxation requirement. The user is fully equipped to fully enhance and enjoy their outdoor living environments to the fullest.

5. With different materials, Onda can be used for both outdoor furniture and indoor furniture. It offers unique solutions for High-end resort and hotel projects.

body_html:
Highlights

Built with weatherproof and UV resistant powder coated aluminium and teak

Strong and sturdy. Weather resistant. Low maintenance, easy care

Suitable for 8+ people, table stretchable from 70.9'' to 94.5''

8 x Dining Arm Chair W22'' D21.7'' H33.5'' SH17.3'' AH25.2''

Weight:148kg

Details

At a Glance:

 

Extend your outdoor patio area with the Heck series. Heck offers a dining experience of up to ten placements (based on extending the table). Heck has been designed using a powder-coated aluminum frame and full natural teak top.

 

Description:

Outdoor dining with family and friends requires space to allow for food, drinks and a place to sit. With Heck’s 9-piece dining set, this is easily achieved. Add additional chairs and Heck's cleverly designed dining extension table can then cater for up to a placement of ten. Heck makes outdoor living convenient and worthwhile.

 

Classic, practical, beautiful! The garden furniture set is made of a sensible material mix that combines many advantages: the powder-coated aluminum rack makes the garden furniture durable and light, the textile saving ensures high seating comfort and the teak wood of tabletop and armrests gives the set its very special look. The 8 chairs can be stackable.
 
 
8 x Higold Heck Arm Chair - Outdoor Chair
      Chair with a modern and elegant design, ideal for furnishing your terrace with style. Seat and back in Textilene with aluminum armrests with Burma teak inserts.
 
 
1 x Extendable table with a modern and elegant design, ideal for decorating your home terrace with style. 

      Powder-coated aluminum structure, with an automatic extension system. Burma teak wood top, 12 mm thick.

 

    . Color: Gloss Champagne/Matte Bronze

 

Frame Coffee Textilene
    . Materials:
        Weather Resistant Frame - Powder Coated Aluminum
        Armrests - Luxury 100% Grade A Teak
        Back and Seat - Textilene

 

About Grade A teak
Grade A teak refers to the mature heartwood of a teak tree. In order to harvest mature heartwood, a teak tree needs to be about 20 years old or more. This is the timber that comes from the very center of the trunk of a teak tree. Grade A teak is rich with natural oil. Grade A teak is what you want your furniture made from. When a teak tree is harvested, less than a quarter of the available wood will be Grade A. So this makes Grade A teak relatively expensive. 

 

Weather Resistant Frame
With a modern-inspired design, this outdoor patio dining table features a paneled top and a powder-coated aluminum frame that is water and UV resistant for years.

 

Tips: You can brush the wood wax oil to keep the original color of teak every few months.

 

Warranty
Frame Durability:  UV Resistant; Rust Resistant; Weather Resistant; Water Resistant

Binding:

Kitchen

 

Artist:

Mark Lewis Art

 

Details:

Shop for signed limited edition collectible modern pop abstract canvas art prints of celebrity music star Jim Morrison artwork by Mark Lewis Art. This framed canvas art was created from an original painting titled "Window Of My Soul" Lewis' eye catching wall decor framed canvas art prints are ideal for any room in your home. Each incredible 22” x 29” canvas art print is hand signed, numbered and delivered with a signed certificate of authenticity Your personal order will arrive in a well-padded package for safe shipping.

 

ABOUT MARK LEWIS:

Lewis is a living descendant of Denton Cy Young the legendary baseball player and Baseball Hall Of Fame recipient for which the Cy Young pitching award was created. Marks' career path has certainly been an eventful one. After serving honorably in the United States Navy Lewis then delved into the performing arts. He spent years as a successful actor, appearing in numerous movies and television programs. Ultimately turning his focus to painting, Lewis brought his expansive life adventures, raw talent and inspiration to the canvas. Lewis instills an immense beauty and creativity in the work that flows from his palette. He achieves that rare feat among artists of creating an unspoken dialog between artist and viewer in his artwork. Lewis' paintings, art prints, collectibles and mugs have been exhibited in numerous galleries throughout the U.S.

title: Indigo Herringbone Weave Alpaca Wool Throw Blanket
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide

(5-12 Days)

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

Color: Indigo

Features:

  • LUXURIOUS QUALITY: Made from 100% Pure Royal Alpaca Fiber-The finest and rarest available. Made from less than one percent of all alpaca fiber, these pieces are incredibly soft, warm, and lusciously cozy. Maloca Alpaca takes great pride in offering the highest level of workmanship, quality, and service.
  • WARMER & LIGHTER: Alpaca wool is lighter and provides more warmth than traditional sheep’s wool. Unlike sheep’s wool, alpaca fiber has microscopic air pockets that make it light and breathable, yet extremely insulating, keeping your body warm and dry in any type of cool or cold climate.
  • NO LANOLIN, NO ITCH: Alpaca fibers create a very unique wool that is completely hypoallergenic. Sheep’s wool gets its itchiness and allergen from lanolin. Alpaca Fiber doesn’t contain lanolin and therefor always feel incredible on skin and never causes a reaction.
  • ETHICALLY & SUSTAINABLY SOURCED: All of our Alpaca wool is ethically sourced from small farmers. These animals live at around 14,000 feet elevation in the southern Peruvian Andes mountain range. Alpaca’s have an exceptionally low environmental impact. –The leave a portion of the grass they graze on and have soft hooves which leave relatively little environmental impact.
  • LIMITED PRODUCTION: Maloca’s collection is woven in small weaving facilities where master weavers create and hand finish our products to the highest standards. We are small family owned and operated business and stand behind the exceptional quality of everything we sell.

Details: This beautiful royal Alpaca herringbone throw is made of the highest quality, pure royal alpaca wool, conscious and sustainably sourced in Peru, and made exclusively for Maloca. Alpaca fiber is incredibly soft and cozy, warmer then wool, light and breathable, and is fully hypoallergenic. These pieces add luscious warmth to any living space or can also be used as a scarf. They also make the perfect gift for any occasion. We've put our heart and soul into these beautiful throws and are confident that you will absolutely love them. My wife and I own and operate this business from our home in the Catskill Mountains in upstate New York. I have traveled to Peru many times in the past few years to source the best quality yarns and build relationships with the good people that help us knit these special throws. We are firm believers that everything we create must be made to the highest standards and in a way that is fully conscious and sustainable. We are involved in every part of sourcing and manufacturing of these special pieces and ensure safe and healthy working conditions, fair wages, and excellent treatment of the animals that offer their wool for our use. Size 180 x 130 centimeters

title: Infrared Sensor Automatic Clamp Wireless Charger
body_html:
Features:

2 in 1 function

Combines charger and phone holder in one unit. You can put your phone in your car when you are driving. Meanwhile, you can charge it through our wireless charger. Wireless charging only supports for QI devices mobile phones.

Fast charge

When you charge your phone that supports fast charge, the wireless charger gives powerful 9V 1.67A output.

Infrared Auto-sensing & touch induction

The infrared ray induction and the touch induction form the automatic switch. When put the phone near 8mm to the infrared auto-sensing area of car phone holder.

360 Degree rotation

The 360-degree rotating ball joint on mount enables flexible viewing angles while driving. You could adjust easily between portrait and landscape orientation.

Single-handed Operation & Silicone pad design

The width of holder can be flexibly adjusted to hold phones automatically. Silicone pad design can protects your phone very well.

Air vent mount

Compared with windshield or dashboard mount, the air vent mount is much easier for you to contact the phone in car and causes less distraction while driving. No tools needed. Circular air outlets are not supported.

title: Irish Cashmere Merino Wool Throw Blanket
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide

(2-7 Days)

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

Color: Teal/Grey

Features:

  • AUTHENTIC IRISH: This Cashmere Merino blend throw blanket is made in Co. Tipperary by John Hanly & Co., founded in 1893.
  • QUALITY IRISH MATERIALS: These throws are made with a luxurious combination of 95% merino wool, and 5% cashmere.
  • SIZED RIGHT: Measuring 54" x 71" with an additional 3" of fringe, our Cashmere Merino throw blankets are the perfect size to stay warm and cozy.
  • PERFECT GIFT: Someone who appreciates the finer things or wants to keep the chill at bay would love this cashmere throw blanket.
  • CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE: Biddy Murphy partners with authentic Irish artisans to bring our customers the finest cashmere throw blankets.

Details:

Wrap Yourself In an Authentic Irish Throw

A Biddy Murphy customer favorite, you may have to order a herringbone throw blanket for your entire family. Find comfort and warmth in the luxuriously soft 95% merino and 5% cashmere Irish blanket. This merino blanket is hypoallergenic which means it is gentle on the skin. It is also breathable and regulates to your body temperature. You will want to wrap yourself in this gorgeous herringbone throw blanket while relaxing on the couch with your favorite book, or snuggled up in bed from some extra warmth.

This Irish blanket will dress up any room in your house as it looks stylish draped over a chair or at the foot of a bed. These are the best gifts for house-warmings, weddings, birthdays or any other important event in your family. Instead, lay it flat on a towel and reshape it as it dries. Fold to store.

We work directly with the world's largest cashmere traders and producers to make sure the cashmere we use are not mixed with any lower end cashmere fibers, thus increasing the softness and anti-pilling performance of our knitwears. Headquartered in New York City, State Cashmere strives to provide a fresh look on cashmere and knitwear, creating styles that are both functional and on trend. The brand's style incorporates a classic but unique use of color, texture and novel details creating styles that are coveted in your closet for years.

Details: The Japanese Footbridge is among Monet's last paintings of this subject, made between 1920 and 1922. Twenty-five years earlier, in the late 1890s, the footbridge provided the subject of Monet's first series of paintings of his pond at Giverny. While the paintings in the earlier series are more naturalistic in style, the later works feature dense swirls and loose strokes of color that almost obscure the form of the bridge. These later paintings also feature a fiery palette of maroons, rusts, and oranges unique within Monet's body of work.

Das Bild "An Explosion of Colors [Cork Map]" auf Kork ist viel leichter als die traditionellen Wanddekorationen. Dank dem können die dekorativen Korktafeln an jedem Platz in Deiner Wohnung oder Büro gehängt werden. Die Leinwand mit dem Ausdruck wird auf die Korktafel angebracht. title: KUPPET Air Fryer, 7 Quart, 1700-Watt Electric Air Fryers Oven for Roasting/Baking/Grilling, 8 Cooking Presets, LED Digital Touchscreen, BPA-Free, ETL Listed RT
body_html:
Details

Healthier Choice: Cooking with Less Oil. KUPPET air fryer reduce 85% less fat than traditionally deep-fried food while maintaining the same delicious taste.

 

Multi-funtion Air Fryers: Digital one-touch screen menu features 8 Presets- Steak, Chicken, Shrimp, Seafood, French Fries, Vegetables and Cake. You can adjust temperature & time more accurately to achieve the best cooking result.

 

Save time: Cook with 360°circulating hot air. With little to no preheating time, whip up dinner in half the time of a conventional oven without heating up the whole kitchen.

 

Large & Nonstick Basket: The Square design basket allows for larger cooking capacity than round ones, which can fits a 6 lbs - 7 lbs whole chicken. Buy this XL 7 Quart size, serves your family with at least 5-7 people. The removable nonstick coated basket is PFOA-free & BPA-free.

 

Temperature: With more wider temperature range of 85℉ to 400 ℉. KUPPET air fryer allows you to grill, bake, fry and roast at your will. Cooking time is faster than a conventional oven, but with crispier and tastier results. Preheat the unit before adding your ingredients to achieve the best results. ETL Listed, 120V, 1700W. 1-Year warranty. If you have any questions during use this air fryer, please feel free to contact our support team.

Sturdy & Durable - The strong metal tube C stand with anti-rust powder coating on the surface can bear 330 pounds. The 4 metal feet evenly distribute the weight so that it won't roll over and ensure your safety.

Spacious and Comfortable - The egg shape of hanging chair makes the middle spacious, so you won’t feel crowded. High quality quick-drying cushion with armrest gives you a comfortable sitting with enough support. Tip: You can adjust the chain length of the swing egg chair to suit your desired sitti

Features:

  • Sacred Smudge - (Cedar, Sage, Lavender) - Clears away negative energies. Tired of smoky sage in your home or office? People all over the world burn sage as a way of clearing energy and spirits from a space -
  • This practice is called smudging. While the traditional method is to burn dried sage leaves - sometimes it's just not feasible. People with allergies, sensitivity to the smoke or shared public environments like apartments and offices make burning sage hard to do. a candle version called "Sacred Smudge".
  • Intended to replace negativity with Love, Light, and Positive Energy.

Binding: Kitchen

Details: Listing is for 1 (one) of the following options below - you choose the candle size or tealight option: - Tealights come in sets of 4 or 6 - size of each tealight is 1.5" diameter and 0.75" height. - 7.5oz Glass Jar - size is 3" height and ~2.75" wide - 8oz Round Tin size is 2" height and ~3" wide - 8oz Square Tin size is 2" height and ~3" wide - 12oz Glass Jar with lid size is 3.5" height and ~3.25" wide - 21oz Glass Jar with lid size is 6.25" height and 3" wide NEW!!! Black ceramic pot with smudge candle - 4" diameter and 2.5" height Look through ALL photos to see the different candle sizes. Ingredients include - Essential Oils - 100% natural eco-soy wax - lead-free wicks - homegrown organic herbs - crystals from my shop to help set your intention. - and of course love, light and positive energy goes into every candle. Candle Safety.

Instructions:

1. Never leave a burning candle unattended.

2. Never use water to extinguish a candle; this is extremely dangerous as it can cause excess heat and steam, which may cause the container/glass to explode.

3. Ensure wicks are upright and trimmed to 7mm (1/4 inch) during use and each time candle is relit.

4. Never move a burning candle. Ensure candle is extinguished, wax is solid and jar is cold before handling.

5. Candle tins may become hot. Burn candle on an appropriate flat heat-resistant surface.

6. Avoid using in drafty areas, near an open window, air duct or fan.

7. Keep away from children, pets and flammable materials.

8. Do not use lid to extinguish candle.

9. Don't burn a candle all the way down. Extinguish the flame if it comes too close to the holder or container.

Our Manifestation Affirmation includes an array of herbs and oils such as ginger, cinnamon, orange, vanilla and many others.

It comes in an 8 oz jar and is made from an all natural soy wax. Before starting any type of manifestation work, we always suggest doing a cleansing ritual. This does not need to be complicated. One simple technique is to simmer basil in water. Let the water cool.

Then add a cup of this with two tablespoons of kosher sea salt into a bath. Enter the bath and visualize any blocks or obstacles washing away. After this is completed, you can move on to the manifestation work. Next, find a quiet place in your home where you won’t have any interruptions.

Think about the things you want to achieve. Feel free to write them down or simply find some images that represent the things that you want. Get your candle and place them directly over your goals. Then light your candle. While lighting your candle state your affirmation out loud. Take a moment to visualize or meditate and then relax into the feelings.

Features

1. Intelligent Detecting: Water comes out once your hands get into the detection zone. And it will stop once you leave the detection zone. Sensor Confirming Time is less than 0.7s.

2. Super mini designed PCB is controlled by computer chip, saving power intelligently. With mini chip controlling, the static power consumption will be no more than 60uA.

 

3. Hygienic: Self-open and close to free hands from any touching, which can prevent you from bacteria mutual infections.

5. Detection Zone Adjusting Automatically: With controlling of mini-computer, it can set up the best detection zone according to the environment automatically.

 

6. Intelligent Power-Saving: Controlled by low-consumption chips and with power-saving working mode, the faucet is super low-consumption. (DC-type products use 4pcs of AA Alkaline batteries. Its statics current is no more than 60μA. Its lifetime can reach 2 years when it's use 300cycles per day.)

 

7. Power Lackage Warning: When the voltage of battery is less than 4.6V, the red indicating light will flash to remind you to recharge.
